message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. This is a great opportunity to get a fantastic product at a competitive price. What do you think?

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe it's a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to make a serious offer for the product. Can you consider my counteroffer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $900000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and your willingness to make a serious offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $880000 for the product. Can you consider this revised offer?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer the product to you for $885000. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value and my initial offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $875000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
